summary: Add validate() and repair() methods for corrupted JSON recovery

validate_method.description: Returns (is_valid: bool, error_message: str | None) tuple

repair_method.description: Recovers valid todos from corrupted JSON with .recovered backup

risks: Regex-based extraction may not recover all valid todos in complex corruption scenarios
Backup files (.recovered) may accumulate if repair is called multiple times
limitations: Cannot recover from completely unstructured content
Manual edits to JSON may still cause issues if format is severely malformed
